chapters.title: Introduction to Ekalavya
chapters.description: Ekalavya, a young Nishada prince, aspired to learn archery under Guru Dronacharya's tutelage.

chapters.title: The Determined Disciple
chapters.description: Denied by Drona, Ekalavya self-trained by creating a statue of Drona and practicing with devotion.

chapters.title: Drona’s Remarkable Request
chapters.description: Impressed by Ekalavya’s skills, Drona demanded his thumb as Guru Dakshina to protect Arjuna's supremacy.

chapters.title: The Ultimate Sacrifice
chapters.description: Ekalavya complied, sacrificing his thumb, symbolizing unparalleled devotion and humility.
